message.simcitymod.chunk_not_residential: §cThis chunk is not a residential area and cannot be claimed.
message.simcitymod.wild_load_error: §c[SimCity] Cannot load the Wild dimension. Please check the server.
message.simcitymod.home_dimension_error: §c[SimCity] Cannot find the saved Home dimension.
message.simcitymod.home_not_set_default: §e[SimCity] No spawn point set. Teleporting to the initial spawn.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_wild_overwor: §cWild spawn can only be set in the Overworld or Wild dimensions.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_home_non_ove: §cHome spawn can only be set in the Overworld dimension.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_nether_nethe: §cNether spawn can only be set in the Nether or custom Nether dimensions.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_end_end_only: §cEnd spawn can only be set in the End or custom End dimensions.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_restricted_d: §cPersonal spawn points (beds, etc.) cannot be set in this dimension.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_invalid: §cInvalid spawn type. (Use: wild | home | end | nether)
message.simcitymod.reset.not_supported_d: §cThis dimension does not support reset. (Use in WILD/NETHER/END areas)
message.simcitymod.reset.success: §aGeneration of the next version (v%s) for dimension %s is complete! (Seed: %s)
message.simcitymod.reset.restart_require: §e§l[IMPORTANT] §r§eYou must restart the server to apply the new terrain.
simcitymod.command.admin.setcenter.succe: §e[General] World border center set! (Maintaining current size)
message.simcitymod.friend_add_self: You cannot add yourself as a friend.
message.simcitymod.friend_already_exists: This player is already on your friend list.
message.simcitymod.friend_not_found: This player is not in your friend list.
message.simcitymod.pregen_start: §a[SimCity] Starting pre-generation for current dimension chunks. Check server logs for progress.
